Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You certainly took your time in coming here.
Now, let us try this milk you're so proud of.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Though I must admit...it's a little--just a little!--
better than I had expected. It's...un-bad!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That my purebreds' milk is superior to that of
your common cows remains uncontested, of
course.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>However, I will say that this milk is ever so
slightly better than your cows' pedigree led me
to expect.
<PAGE>
So, er...perhaps I must retract at least some
portion of what I said before.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm...I'm saying I'm sorry I made fun of your
cows!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, you have not forgotten the reason you
brought your milk to me, have you?
<PAGE>
The milk is the entire point of your visit. Don't
tell me it slipped your mind.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well then. I think I know where your cows get
their unshakeable sedateness from.
<PAGE>
Speaking with you leaves me feeling
rather...spent.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Never you mind. It's nothing.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I have ascertained your cows' value
now. Once you have finished drinking that, you
may leave.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>I am rather busy today, and must shortly be off.
Thank you for coming, and good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ick! What IS this disgusting concoction? How
can you refute the importance of breeding when
this...liquid...is what you have to show for it?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It is, as expected, precisely as it appeared--
nothing worthy of notice.
<PAGE>
What an unfortunate waste of time. Once you've
finished with that--if you're brave enough to
drink it--I'll thank you to be on your way.
<PAGE>
I have a very full schedule today, so I must take
my leave. Thank you for coming, and good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well...it is not disgusting, but at the same time I
cannot in good conscience call it tasty. It seems
this turned out predictably.
<PAGE>
After how you went on about how breeding isn't
everything, is this the best you have to show for
it? I feel silly for expecting more.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Oh well. I suppose this milk may be suitable for
the bowls of the peasantry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well then, now that we've gotten to the bottom
of this matter, there's no need to dally. Finish up
and be on your way.
